channel.title: CiTR -- Trancendance
channel.description: Trancendance has been broadcasting from Vancouver, BC since 2001. We favour Psytrance, Hard Trance and Epic Trance, but also play Acid Trance, Deep Trance, Hard Dance and even some Breakbeat. We also love a good Classic Trance Anthem, especially if its remixed. Current influences include Sander van Doorn, Gareth Emery, Nick Sentience, Ovnimoon, Ace Ventura, Save the Robot, Liquid Soul and Astrix. Older influences include Union Jack, Carl Cox, Christopher Lawrence, Whoop! Records, Tidy Trax, Platipus Records and Nukleuz. http://trancendance.net | http://www.facebook.com/pages/Trancendance/112248815482108 | http://twitter.com/#!/djsmileymike | http://soundcloud.com/dj-smiley-mike
channel.itunes:summary: Trancendance has been broadcasting from Vancouver, BC since 2001. We favour Psytrance, Hard Trance and Epic Trance, but also play Acid Trance, Deep Trance, Hard Dance and even some Breakbeat. We also love a good Classic Trance Anthem, especially if its remixed. Current influences include Sander van Doorn, Gareth Emery, Nick Sentience, Ovnimoon, Ace Ventura, Save the Robot, Liquid Soul and Astrix. Older influences include Union Jack, Carl Cox, Christopher Lawrence, Whoop! Records, Tidy Trax, Platipus Records and Nukleuz. http://trancendance.net | http://www.facebook.com/pages/Trancendance/112248815482108 | http://twitter.com/#!/djsmileymike | http://soundcloud.com/dj-smiley-mike

item.description: dj Smiley Mike Hosts
item.itunes:subtitle: Expanding last week's set

item.title: Tracendance on CiTR (11-Mar-2007)
item.description: After a mediocre attempt last week, this week's set does a much better job of capturing the energy of The Spirit Circle.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Real Spirit Circle Set

item.title: Tracendance on CiTR (04-Mar-2007)
item.description: Lots of familiar tracks - remixed. Several of them white label versions.
item.itunes:subtitle: Spirit Circle Set

item.title: Tracendance on CiTR (21-Jan-2007)
item.description: Hard House style set with lots of records from the Nukleuz label as well as some Tidy Two tracks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hard Trance

item.title: Tracendance on CiTR (14-Jan-2007)
item.description: Various records including tracks from Noom Records and WellWicked among others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mixed Bag

item.title: Tracendance on CiTR (07-Jan-2007)
item.description: Platipus Records has become a well-known trance label with consistently brilliant tracks. Some of the most intelligently written music in our day and age. This is the modern classical.
item.itunes:subtitle: Platipus Records Set

item.title: Trancendance on CiTR (17-Dec-2006)
item.description: The first half of this weeks show is all Eve Records. The second half features early Acid influences with tracks from VCF, Choci's Chewns and Space Flower Records.
item.itunes:subtitle: Early Acid Trance

item.title: Trancendance on CiTR (10-Dec-2006)
item.description: After a couple weeks off we're back to the usual mix of ripping electro trance and breakbeat riffs. Several tracks by Natious and Tarantella (Whoop! Records) as well as a few white labels.
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to our Regular Programming

item.title: Trancendance on CiTR (19-Nov-2006)
item.description: In the second of two fundraising shows we continue to explore Smiley Mike's early electronic music influences including Acrid Abeyance, Rabbit in the Moon, Crystal Method, DJ Misjah, Skylab 2000, Finitribe & Gypsy among others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Early Electronic Influences - Part 2

item.title: Trancendance on CiTR (12-Nov-2006)
item.description: In the first of two fund raising shows, we break away from our usual continuous mix of electronic music to explore some of host dj Smiley Mike's early electronic music influences. Features tracks by The Justified Ancients of Mu Mu, The KLF, Utah Saints, Urban Cookie Collective, Acen, The Grid, Joey Beltram, The Aquanauts & Sourmash.
item.itunes:subtitle: Early Electronic Influences - Part 1
